This is a very good game, there's a bit problems in it. But all in all it's a prefect fps game. It's a great place to learn Russian language, but it's mostly the curse words, such as [spoiler]"сука блять, suka blyat"[/spoiler] or [spoiler]"иди на хуи, idi na hui"[/spoiler] or [spoiler]"Заткнись пидор, zatknis pidor"[/spoiler]. You may use google translate to look them up if you don't know them, but it's a very good phrases to learn to communicate with other russians. If you want to be good at the game, you need to learn how the game works, learn the different recoils on most of the weapons, learn your crosshair placement, be good at communicating good and not toxic, pick a map you want to play on and learn the callouts. Be a teamplayer and manage your financial in the game, like what to buy at the specific round or what not to buy.
As i, student, haven't had that much of a time to play but i do it anyways, i'm failing some of my classes because i'm not doing my homeworks or assignments because i would rather be better at the game, and hopefully have a living out of the game

EDIT: If you are going to download this game, remember at the beginning you will have to play casual or deathmatch and gain xp to level up, and if you have enough level you will unlock the competitive mode, and if you haven't payed for the Prime Status Upgrade, you may experience some hackers in your matches or servers
